attributes.action: Create legislation which will stop the consumer con of companies advertising products with 'no VAT'. They should make it clear that the products do include VAT, and that the companies pay the VAT in the normal way.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Typical advert: Buy this leather suite now and no VAT to pay...today only.
The reality is the company may have discounted the product by the equivalent of the original VAT element, but the new price still includes VAT at 17.5% of the net price.
Therefore the claim is a lie.
